title: Josep Borrell begins his term as President of CIDOB | CIDOB
snippet: Following his appointment by the institution’s Board on 13 December, the former head of European diplomacy has begun his agenda as President of CIDOB, a leading think tank in international relations based in Barcelona. title: The Board of CIDOB proposes Josep Borrell for the presidency of the institution | CIDOB
snippet: Josep Borrell will take office soon, once the necessary administrative formalities have been completed.

title: Josep Borrell presidirá el Cidob, la puerta de Barcelona al mundo | CIDOB
snippet: Josep Borrell, exjefe de la diplomacia y la seguridad europeas, será el nuevo presidente del Cidob, uno de los think tanks mejor valorados del mundo en el ámbito de las relaciones internacionales.
